data.text:
Let's deepen our mutual understanding―― 
It had been a little while since that conversation.
data.processed:
󠁿Let's deepen our mutual understanding―― 
󠁿It had been a little while since that conversation.

data.text:
A normal day. Thinking about future training menus, 
organizing documents, planning future races――
data.processed:
󠁿A normal day. Thinking about future training menus, 
󠁿organizing documents, planning future races――

data.text:
After finishing that, having lunch. Going to the cafeteria and 
exchanging information and making small talk with colleagues.
data.processed:
󠁿After finishing that, having lunch. Going to the cafeteria and 
󠁿exchanging information and making small talk with colleagues.

data.text: A normal day……except for one thing.
data.processed: 󠁿A normal day……except for one thing.

data.text:
I already knew who it was though, because inevitably, 
she would enter my view. However……
data.processed:
󠁿I already knew who it was though, because inevitably, 
󠁿she would enter my view. However……

data.text:
……"The Oort Cloud"…… nothing 『Special』…… 
a 『Person』 and their daily activities……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……"The Oort Cloud"…… nothing 『Special』…… 
󠁿a 『Person』 and their daily activities……

data.text:
But "Observation" is still unfeasible. 
……a "Concept"? It exists but "cannot be discerned"……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿But "Observation" is still unfeasible. 
󠁿……a "Concept"? It exists but "cannot be discerned"……

data.text:
I suppose she was just observing, so I didn't 
do anything to try and stop her. But……
data.processed:
󠁿I suppose she was just observing, so I didn't 
󠁿do anything to try and stop her. But……

data.text:
But if she was going to do this several days 
in a row, it was probably a good idea to talk 
to her. Rather, since we have the chance――
data.processed:
󠁿But if she was going to do this several days 
󠁿in a row, it was probably a good idea to talk 
󠁿to her. Rather, since we have the chance――

data.text:
"Big Bang"……I've been noticed…… 
Neo Universe's 『Heart Skipped a Beat』……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿"Big Bang"……I've been noticed…… 
󠁿Neo Universe's 『Heart Skipped a Beat』……

data.text:
…………。
……"Stabilization". ……Haaaaa……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿…………。
󠁿……"Stabilization". ……Haaaaa……

data.text:
Yes, 『Closer』. 
……"Observation" will continue at close range.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, 『Closer』. 
󠁿……"Observation" will continue at close range.

data.text:
Saying that, Neo Universe once again continued staring 
at me. Although it was difficult to understand her words, 
it was probably possible to understand her actions.
data.processed:
󠁿Saying that, Neo Universe once again continued staring 
󠁿at me. Although it was difficult to understand her words, 
󠁿it was probably possible to understand her actions.

data.text:
(……"METI"……? 
Trainer is trying to read the "trajectory"……?)
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿(……"METI"……? 
󠁿Trainer is trying to read the "trajectory"……?)

data.text:
(……I need to "Observe" more closely…… 
If I miss it, it'll be like a "Shooting Star"……)
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿(……I need to "Observe" more closely…… 
󠁿If I miss it, it'll be like a "Shooting Star"……)

data.text:
As if to make sure she missed nothing, 
her restless gaze continued to focus on me.
data.processed:
󠁿As if to make sure she missed nothing, 
󠁿her restless gaze continued to focus on me.

data.text:
When I first met her, it seemed like she had this unique 
atmosphere that made her seem aloof and out of reach, but now――
data.processed:
󠁿When I first met her, it seemed like she had this unique 
󠁿atmosphere that made her seem aloof and out of reach, but now――

data.text:
Seeing her like this, she seemed more like an innocent, 
curious puppy……though thinking that might be a little rude.
data.processed:
󠁿Seeing her like this, she seemed more like an innocent, 
󠁿curious puppy……though thinking that might be a little rude.

data.text: Looking at Neo Universe like that, I couldn't help but smile.
data.processed: 󠁿Looking at Neo Universe like that, I couldn't help but smile.

data.text:
……Today we're 『Outside School』. 
『Different』 from normal…… that's why, Trainer too……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……Today we're 『Outside School』. 
󠁿『Different』 from normal…… that's why, Trainer too……

data.text:
…… Trainer. 
Neo Universe "seeks" to go on a 『Walk』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿…… Trainer. 
󠁿Neo Universe "seeks" to go on a 『Walk』.

data.text:
On Neo Universe's suggestion, we decided to go for a walk. 
For now, we decided to just pick a random store……
data.processed:
󠁿On Neo Universe's suggestion, we decided to go for a walk. 
󠁿For now, we decided to just pick a random store……

data.text: ……There was no particular conversation though.
data.processed: 󠁿……There was no particular conversation though.

data.text:
……A "Phenomenon" that can't be 『Explained』. 
It's necessary for it to 『Resolve』 by 『Itself』……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……A "Phenomenon" that can't be 『Explained』. 
󠁿It's necessary for it to 『Resolve』 by 『Itself』……

data.text:
She probably meant 『I want to solve this myself』……I guess. 
There was definitely something bothering her, but it didn't 
seem to be a serious issue.
data.processed:
󠁿She probably meant 『I want to solve this myself』……I guess. 
󠁿There was definitely something bothering her, but it didn't 
󠁿seem to be a serious issue.

data.text:
If that's the case, then there's no reason to worry. 
Leaving the shopping mall, we continued the leisurely stroll.
data.processed:
󠁿If that's the case, then there's no reason to worry. 
󠁿Leaving the shopping mall, we continued the leisurely stroll.

data.text:
……『Hydration』 required. 
"Polaris" is not visible, but there is a 『Destination』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……『Hydration』 required. 
󠁿"Polaris" is not visible, but there is a 『Destination』.

data.text:
『I'm thirsty』 is probably what she meant. 
That was easy to understand――so easy, I couldn't help but smile.
data.processed:
󠁿『I'm thirsty』 is probably what she meant. 
󠁿That was easy to understand――so easy, I couldn't help but smile.

data.text:
……"Satisfied", it seems……"Guidance" was smooth. 
Part of Trainer's "cycle"……?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……"Satisfied", it seems……"Guidance" was smooth. 
󠁿Part of Trainer's "cycle"……?

data.text: Neo Universe finished drinking her juice.
data.processed: 󠁿Neo Universe finished drinking her juice.

data.text:
She was……probably asking if this was my favorite shop or how 
often I came. Judging by her expression it was probably the latter.

choices.text: Um……once in a while I guess?

data.processed:
󠁿She was……probably asking if this was my favorite shop or how 
󠁿often I came. Judging by her expression it was probably the latter.

data.text: ……I see……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿……I see……

data.text: Seems like I was correct.
data.processed: 󠁿Seems like I was correct.

data.text:
……"Psc"……on the surface of the water……they're sticking 
their mouths out……do they require "Replenishment"?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……"Psc"……on the surface of the water……they're sticking 
󠁿their mouths out……do they require "Replenishment"?

data.text:
I looked out on to the lake and saw fish gathered at the surface. 
No doubt, she was asking 『Do they want food?』……!

choices.text: They should be selling some nearby!

data.processed:
󠁿I looked out on to the lake and saw fish gathered at the surface. 
󠁿No doubt, she was asking 『Do they want food?』……!

data.text:
………… 
……Mmm. Neo Universe wants to "seek" it.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿………… 
󠁿……Mmm. Neo Universe wants to "seek" it.

data.text:
It really turned out to be an easy-going time, 
wandering without a goal in mind. Neo Universe's 
expression had remained unchanged, but――
data.processed:
󠁿It really turned out to be an easy-going time, 
󠁿wandering without a goal in mind. Neo Universe's 
󠁿expression had remained unchanged, but――

data.text: …………Neo Universe wasn't thinking about whether it was 『Fun』……
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: 󠁿…………Neo Universe wasn't thinking about whether it was 『Fun』……

data.text:
It didn't seem like she was going to say it wasn't fun. 
She was thinking about something else……I guess that's what it means?
data.processed:
󠁿It didn't seem like she was going to say it wasn't fun. 
󠁿She was thinking about something else……I guess that's what it means?

data.text:
She really was a mysterious girl. She had a unique atmosphere, 
and sometime it seemed she had a vague presence――But――
data.processed:
󠁿She really was a mysterious girl. She had a unique atmosphere, 
󠁿and sometime it seemed she had a vague presence――But――

data.text:
The current Neo Universe seemed to be struggling 
with this question. She just seemed like a normal 
Uma Musume who didn't understand much about herself……
data.processed:
󠁿The current Neo Universe seemed to be struggling 
󠁿with this question. She just seemed like a normal 
󠁿Uma Musume who didn't understand much about herself……

data.text: I laughed at that gap between personalities
data.processed: 󠁿I laughed at that gap between personalities

data.text:
(………… 
Trainer is always 『Thinking』. Always "Oscillating".)
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿(………… 
󠁿Trainer is always 『Thinking』. Always "Oscillating".)

data.text:
(……It's 『Mysterious』. 
Unlike 『Other People』……not creating a "Vacuum")
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿(……It's 『Mysterious』. 
󠁿Unlike 『Other People』……not creating a "Vacuum")

data.text:
I once again felt a gaze. Once again it was from 
the Uma Musume in front of me. Communication might 
not be smooth, but this was fine in it's own way――
data.processed:
󠁿I once again felt a gaze. Once again it was from 
󠁿the Uma Musume in front of me. Communication might 
󠁿not be smooth, but this was fine in it's own way――

data.text:
……Affirmative. 
Neo Universe will 『Return』 with Trainer.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
󠁿……Affirmative. 
󠁿Neo Universe will 『Return』 with Trainer.

data.text: ……it seemed like this would be kind of fun.
data.processed: 󠁿……it seemed like this would be kind of fun.
